response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return on our investment. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and hope to hear from you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
